content.rendered:
This Gender Analysis Guidance Tool has been developed to help civil society organisations in the Caribbean understand the connections between gender and climate change, as well as develop gender-sensitive policies and programmes for adapting to climate change.

Download the Gender Analysis Guidance Tool

excerpt.rendered: This Gender Analysis Guidance Tool has been developed to help civil society organisations in the Caribbean understand the connections between gender and climate change, as well as develop gender-sensitive policies and programmes for adapting to climate change.
